tutorial.title: Your PayPal Account is Suspended
tutorial.body:
Dear Customer,

We noticed unusual activity in your account and have been temporarily suspended access. Please log in with the link below to restore access.

Log In Now
tutorial.hint: Always double check who the sender is.
tutorial.answer: This is a Phish because the sender is "paypall.com" instead of "paypal.com".

tutorial.title: Problem with Package Delivery
tutorial.body:
Dear Customer,

We couldn't deliver your package. Please confirm your delivery information by clicking the link below.

Link
tutorial.userDescription: You did not purchase anything on Amazon recently.
tutorial.hint: Even if it sounds realistic, always double check if its contextually realistic.
tutorial.answer: This is a Phish because you did not order a package.

tutorial.title: New Security Feature Activation
tutorial.body:
Click here to activate your new security feature:

http://boa-security.com/activate
tutorial.hint: Make sure any links look like they are official.
tutorial.answer: This is a Phish because the link is from not an official bank domain.

tutorial.title: IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED: Account Closure
tutorial.body:
We've detected multiple failed login attempts on your account.

If you do not verify your account within 2 hours, it will be permanently deleted.

Verify Account
tutorial.hint: Pay close attention to the language and tone of the email.
tutorial.answer: This is a Phish because of the threat (time pressure) and urgent language.

tutorial.title: Billing Reviw Needed
tutorial.body:
Dear User,

There is a prolbem with your biling information.

Please updat your details to keep service on.

Click now
tutorial.hint: Pay close attention to the spelling.
tutorial.answer: This is a Phish because of the very poor spelling and grammar.

tutorial.title: Password Reset Required
tutorial.body: Due to recent security upgrades, all employees must reply to this email with their username and password for revalidation.
tutorial.hint: Remember the context and sender of the email.
tutorial.answer: This is a Phish because no one will directly ask for your credentials via email.
